channel.title: How to Increase number of Workers in Redash V9
channel.description:
### Issue Summary Currently we are beta testing with Redash v9 and we need to understand how can we further increase/decrease number of Adhoc workers in Redash. Since previously we could directly increase using `Woker_Count` variable present in `docker-compose.yml` Is there any similar option for redash v9 as well? A summary of the issue and the browser/OS environment in which it occurs.
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: V9 * Browser/OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS * How did you install Redash: Git repo using docker compose

item.title: How to Increase number of Workers in Redash V9

item.title: How to Increase number of Workers in Redash V9
item.dc:creator: arnav0024
item.description:
Issue Summary

Currently we are beta testing with Redash v9 and we need to understand how can we further increase/decrease number of Adhoc workers in Redash. Since previously we could directly increase using Woker_Count variable present in docker-compose.yml
Is there any similar option for redash v9 as well?
A summary of the issue and the browser/OS environment in which it occurs.

Technical details:

  • Redash Version: V9
  • Browser/OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • How did you install Redash: Git repo using docker compose

Read full topic
